channel.title: Free advertisements for your server
channel.description:
As a sort of give back to this community, if anyone would like me to advertise their minecraft server on my website (free of charge) then reply to this thread with a in-game image of something interesting on your server, what version it is, server ip:port, and a little description. If you have a website you can also include this, but it will be a no-follow link.
For a little information on this website, I am targeting a 20k/month search term in Google, so once its ranked you such see a traffic increase.
